title: Robot Management System
text: Our cutting-edge Robot Management System combines Robotics, IoT, Digital Twin, and AI Analytics for seamless operations.

section.title: Multi-Brand Compatibility
section.content: Manage various robot brands in a unified interface.

section.title: IoT Integration
section.content: Supports door and lift access control. Also support real-time monitoring.

section.title: Digital Twin
section.content: Monitor equipment in real-time within a 3D model.

section.title: AI-Powered Insights
section.content: e.g. Lift noise inspection for early fault detection. Ceiling water leakage analysis for proactive maintenance.
